column.name: crval1
column.description: Value at reference pixel on axis 1

column.name: crval2
column.description: Value at reference pixel on axis 2

column.name: equinox
column.description: Catalog equinox of the object coords

column.name: datadicv
column.description: Data dictionary version in LCOGT pipeline

column.name: hdrver
column.description: Version of the FITS Header keywords

column.name: siteid
column.description: ID code of the observatory site

column.name: encid
column.description: ID code of the telescope enclosure

column.name: latitude
column.description: WGS84 geodetic latitude of the telescope in decimal degrees with North +ve.

column.name: longitud
column.description: WGS84 geodetic longitude of the telescope in decimal degrees with East +ve.

column.name: height
column.description: WGS84 geodetic elevation of the telescope.

column.name: molfrnum
column.description: Exposure no. within the observation group (molecule)

column.name: frmtotal
column.description: Total no. of exposures within molecule

column.name: obstelem
column.description: Link to the observation telemetry file

column.name: timesys
column.description: Time system used for all dates

column.name: fdate
column.description: UTC date and time the FITS file was written

column.name: date_obs
column.description: UTC start date and time of observation

column.name: day_obs
column.description: Date at start of local observing night

column.name: utstart
column.description: The start time of the observation

column.name: utstop
column.description: The stop time of the observation

column.name: mjd_obs
column.description: Modified Julian Date of observation start

column.name: filter1
column.description: The filter type in the first filter wheel

column.name: filteri1
column.description: The filter ID in the first filter wheel

column.name: filter2
column.description: The filter type in the second filter wheel

column.name: filteri2
column.description: The filter ID in the second filter wheel

column.name: filter3
column.description: The filter type in the third filter wheel

column.name: filteri3
column.description: The filter ID in the third filter wheel

column.name: fwid
column.description: The ID of the filter wheel

column.name: instrume
column.description: The name of the instrument used

column.name: icsver
column.description: The version number of the ICS

column.name: confname
column.description: The name for the instrument configuration

column.name: detectid
column.description: The name/serial number for the detector

column.name: ccdsec
column.description: Region of the full CCD that was read out

column.name: biassec
column.description: Region of binned CCD for bias/overscan

column.name: trimsec
column.description: Section of CCD containing useful data

column.name: ccdxpixe
column.description: Physical CCD pixel size along X

column.name: ccdypixe
column.description: Physical CCD pixel size along Y

column.name: pixscale
column.description: Nominal pixel scale on the sky

column.name: tracknum
column.description: Unique identifier to track a UserRequest

column.name: reqnum
column.description: Unique identifier to track a sub-Request

column.name: moluid
column.description: The molecule unique id from POND.

column.name: blktype
column.description: The type of constraints from obs group

column.name: blksdate
column.description: UTC date and time of the block start.

column.name: blkedate
column.description: UTC date and time when block will expire.

column.name: blkmnph
column.description: Maximum lunar phase required for block

column.name: blkmndst
column.description: Minimum lunar distance required for block

column.name: etrigger
column.description: External trigger ID of Target of Opportunity event

column.name: radesys
column.description: Fundamental coordinate system of the object

column.name: lst
column.description: Local Sideral Time at observation start (HH:MM:SS.ss).

column.name: cat_epoc
column.description: Catalog epoch of the object coordinates

column.name: pm_ra
column.description: Proper motion in RA of the object

column.name: pm_dec
column.description: Proper motion in Dec of the object

column.name: amstart
column.description: Airmass at the start of observation

column.name: amend
column.description: Airmass at the end of observation

column.name: focdmd
column.description: Demanded focus position in focal plane

column.name: focposn
column.description: Actual focus position in focal plane

column.name: focoboff
column.description: Observer focus offset/defocus in focal plane

column.name: focfloff
column.description: Filter focus offset in focal plane

column.name: m2pitch
column.description: Secondary mirror (M2) vertex tilt in pitch

column.name: m2roll
column.description: Secondary mirror (M2) vertex tilt in roll

column.name: foctemp
column.description: Temperature in the focus compensation routine.

column.name: agra
column.description: Right Ascension of the guide star

column.name: wcssolvr
column.description: Solver for the World Coordinate System

column.name: wcsnref
column.description: Number of stars in image available to define WCS

column.name: wcsmatch
column.description: Number of stars in image matched against reference catalog

column.name: wcnterms
column.description: Number of terms used in WCS fit

column.name: wcsdelra
column.description: Shift of fitted WCS with respect to nominal RA

column.name: wcsdelde
column.description: Shift of fitted WCS with respect to nominal Dec

column.name: wcserr
column.description: Error status of WCS fit. 0 for no error

column.name: l1statbi
column.description: Status flag for bias frame correction

column.name: l1statda
column.description: Status flag for dark frame correction

column.name: l1idshut
column.description: Filename of shutter correction frame used

column.name: l1ellipa
column.description: Position angle of mean image ellipticity

column.name: l1pubdat
column.description: UTC date and time the frame becomes public

column.name: fsize
column.description: File size for the FITS image

column.name: lco_id
column.description: Root name given to the files

column.name: batch_id
column.description: Batch ID for the delivered data

column.name: catver
column.description: Version number of catalog data dictionary

column.name: tcorsyst
column.description: Reference frame time system for TCORR

column.name: spt_ind
column.description: Level 7 HTM index of (ra, dec), decimal encoding

column.name: htm20
column.description: Level 20 HTM index of (ra, dec), binary encoding
